attributes.action: Monitor Downloading Of The Internet For Illegal Activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just like the police have speed cameras and prosecute speeding, or police have patrols and arrest drug taking, I believe it has come to the point where police need an active role in the internet, not to collect data of people, but to stop illegal downloading of peadophilia files, movies, music and other software which has not been personally bought.

This does not support the collection of data, more just monitoring of what is going on the cyber world.
